events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and will begin our review shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on their experience with software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to guide them through the hiring process and to schedule interviews.
The initial screening call was completed successfully with the candidate, discussing their software engineering skills and background.
The candidate responded promptly with their availability for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate to evaluate their coding and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance and demonstrated excellent software development skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled to further assess the candidate's cultural fit and discuss benefits and company policies.
The HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on the candidate's alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and other relevant employment terms.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and has requested a brief period to consider the terms before responding.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to join our engineering team in the upcoming onboarding phase.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including orientation, setup, and introduction to the team.
The hiring process is officially closed as the new software engineer has fully onboarded and started productive work within the team.
